message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but $9,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I'm getting close to your price, but I can only stretch to $9,500. Can we meet at that price?
